mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_resource (course_id, chapter_id, resource_name, resource_type, resource_url, upload_user_id, upload_time, file_size, description, is_public, download_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{chapterId}, #{resourceName}, #{resourceType}, #{resourceUrl}, #{uploadUserId}, NOW(), #{fileSize}, #{description}, #{isPublic}, #{downloadCount}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE course_resource SET course_id = #{courseId}, chapter_id = #{chapterId}, resource_name = #{resourceName}, resource_type = #{resourceType}, resource_url = #{resourceUrl}, upload_user_id = #{uploadUserId}, file_size = #{fileSize}, description = #{description}, is_public = #{isPublic}, download_count = #{downloadCount}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE resource_id = #{resourceId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM course_resource WHERE course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
